level.heading: Injunction.
level.text: No application or petition for injunction against any domestic, foreign or alien society, or lodge thereof, shall be recognized in any court of the District unless made by the Corporation Counsel upon request of the Commissioner.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-5301.
